TITLE: Waves Hands | The first blockchain hands game!

SHARE.TEXT: I created a game on Waves Hands. Fight me

MATCHES.TITLE: Recent Matches
MATCHES.DISABLED_TEXT: Waves Hands is currently closed for maintenance. Sorry for the inconvenience. If your game was in progress, don’t worry - you can finish it after we’re back online. Your funds will be returned safely.

MATCH.KEEPER: Keeper is not available. Install the extension to access the game.
MATCH.SHARE: Share the match link to friends, or wait for players to join.
MATCH.NOW_WAIT_OPPONENT: Now wait your opponent to reveal his move.
MATCH.NOW_WAIT_CREATOR: Now wait creator to reveal his move.
MATCH.TRY_LUCK: You can try your luck in other matches.
MATCH.CLOSE_CONFIRM: The match in progress. You may lose your funds. Are you sure you want to close?

TOUR.WELCOME_SUBTITLE: This game is very similar to the well-known «Rock–Paper–Scissors» - but this one is fully decentralised and powered by Waves’ smart contracts technology.
TOUR.WELCOME_TEXT:
To play you need:

  1. Desktop operating system (Windows, MacOs, Linux).
  2. The latest version of Google Chrome or Firefox.
  3. Waves Keeper installed (Chrome, Firefox).
  4. A minimum balance of 1.001 WAVES.
TOUR.STEP1_TEXT: In this area you can see all the games that have been played in the past, with their winners and losers, as well as games that have been created and are waiting for a second player and games that are in progress.
TOUR.STEP2_TEXT: Each game is a smart contract on the Waves blockchain, with all the game processes recorded and executed in a decentralised manner - 100% transparent and reliable.
TOUR.STEP3_TEXT:
Each game has one of three statuses:

  • Open - the game has been created and can be joined by a second player
  • Pending - the game has two players and will resolve soon
  • Closed - the game is resolved
TOUR.STEP4_TEXT: Push the button and choose your winning combination of hands!

MESSAGE.PROCESS_REVEAL_MATCH: Your match is finishing. Please, wait...
MESSAGE.PROCESS_PAYOUT_MATCH: Your match makes payouts. Please, wait...
MESSAGE.ACTION_RECEIVE: You received a reward of {1} Waves for the match #{2}
MESSAGE.ACTION_DRAW: Your match #{1} has been completed with a draw
